website_summaries.verdict: Create a highly-detailed replica of Leonard and Sheldon's living room with this 484-piece LEGO set inspired by the hit TV show.
pros: Measures roughly 3"H x 8"W x 4"D. Includes mini-figures for all 7 main characters from the show
Comes with a booklet about designers and the hit TV show
Recommended for ages 12+ who enjoy the show

customer_reviews.title: Excellent LEGO set
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my favorite LEGO ideas Sets. It is really very well designed. Any “The Big Bang Theory” fan should buy at least one. The minifigures are quite excellent and very alike to the cast, specially Sheldon, Amy, Leonard and Raj
customer_reviews.author: Oscar W Romero G

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: GREAT set! How many Lego sets come with 7 mini-figures? And I was delighted to see Raj's pup, Cinnamon! Our 2 kids, ages 12 & 10, had fun putting it together for me. It went together pretty easily. They did mistake the white board markers for lipstick, ha! This is a great set for collectors! Totally happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie Kline

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorite shows! Fits perfectly on the shelf by my TV! :D
customer_reviews.text: I really love TBBT (The Big Bang Theory) and thus have seen many many episodes featuring Sheldon and Leonard's shared apartment. This Lego set hits the nail on the head because it contains so many little details that are just spot on! Oh and the mini figs (minifigures) are just so fun and match their real life counterparts so well! This is definitely one of my favorite sets from the Lego ideas submissions. I think that every fan of the show would love this set which makes it a MUST HAVE! It's to die for and just so perfect! I'm so glad that Lego makes such fun sets like this one. :)
customer_reviews.author: Brett TTop Contributor: Architecture

customer_reviews.title: Just brilliant and adorable and shocked at what an amazing replica ...
customer_reviews.text: Just brilliant and adorable and shocked at what an amazing replica it is. I'm 34 years old and an excellent Lego builder and it took me about 2 hours. Currently sitting on my desk at work and worth every penny. Or should I say, worth every Penny - knock knock knock - Penny - knock knock knock -Penny - knock knock knock. ;)
customer_reviews.author: sgsgsg

customer_reviews.title: A Little Crowded but a Great Set
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this set! My only complaint is that all of the extra pieces like the whiteboard don't fit comfortably on the set. I'm glad they included all of the character (including Cinnamon) but there clearly is not enough space to put everyone around the set comfortably. Another row or two of floor would have helped. Other than those two things, I was very impressed with the amount of detail that went into the props in the background. It sits perfectly on my bookshelf and I hope they make more of the Big Bang Theory sets (Sheldon's room, Howards lab, or Penny's apartment, maybe).
customer_reviews.author: E. Reeves

customer_reviews.title: Bazinga! Fun kit for any Big Bang Theory fan.
customer_reviews.text: My son went nuts. It's much more complex a kit than you'd think by looking at the photos. He loved that it had lots of extra, oddball accessories not found in other Lego kits. The characters don't look all that much like their TV counterparts (example, Amy should not be wearing pants) but it's still a fun representation of the show. I told my son that he should have left it un-played with, "Mint in the Box" like Sheldon would have done. No dice. It's put together on his desk!
customer_reviews.author: Jay Finnsey

customer_reviews.title: Great set for Big Bang fans
customer_reviews.text: This set is fun to put together, and comes with a good number of mini-figs and accessories (including ones not even picture on the box, Cinnamon & kitchenware). There's some very clever things going on in how items like the desk lamp, rocket, and telescope are put together, but it's not a great kit if you were looking to build imaginatively obviously (since it's mostly long beige/tan blocks). The only thing that bugs me is that the black chair is a little awkward, since you can't snap the figs into it, they slid out if you pick the model up.
customer_reviews.author: VPM

customer_reviews.title: Even fun for this adult....
customer_reviews.text: As a senior I am always looking for something new to try and to keep me busy. I watched some young relatives assembling their Legos and since I am a huge fan of THE BIG BANG THEORY, I thought this would be a fun project. I did enjoy building it. Kept me busy for a few hours. Now I have the finished project on display. I doubt if I would ever build another Lego, but this was a nice way to kill some time.
customer_reviews.author: AverageGuy

customer_reviews.title: Fun and easy to build!
customer_reviews.text: So fun to build and easy to follow instructions. I even added lights to get the full effect. Perfect for fans of the show or someone who just loves building legos. All the details they added amazed me the more I built it and could see the little things. A + LEGO set! Makes me want to get more sets to build
customer_reviews.author: Alessa M. Hill

customer_reviews.title: They did such a good job making the Lego characters look like the real ...
customer_reviews.text: Delivered as promised. I highly suggest this for all Big Bang Theory fans. Once we finish putting it together, we plan to display it somewhere in our house. They did such a good job making the Lego characters look like the real characters on the show.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Packed for safety
customer_reviews.text: Cowoverthemoon took great care to feature the fragile aspect of this product by marking the package on the outside as well as packing it safely on the inside. It shows how much they care for the product and the customer. Would not hesitate to purchase from them again!!
customer_reviews.author: cmb58

customer_reviews.title: LEGO Ideas The Big Bang Theory
customer_reviews.text: Lego's are great! This set is absolutely adorable if your a Big Bang Theory fan. The little square heads of the gang are too cute. Lego put a lot of detail into this set to create the faces and apartment to make it all look realistic (for what it is). The set has 484 pieces and is so cute and unique you'll want to put it on display for all to see. I think it would a great activity for any group, adults or children. This could quite possibly become a collectors item.
customer_reviews.author: Susan E.

customer_reviews.title: A 59 year old TBBT fan and do this!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used Legos since I was a kid and have never put together a kit before! I love the Big Bang Therory so this was fun to put together. It took me about 6 hours with all the tiny pieces that were so intergral in the room! I put the completed room with all the great characters (and I love Cinnamon the puppy) on my bookcase at work. It looks great there and is just too cute! For anyone who loves TBBT, this kit will be a fun way to let others know you are a fan.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: High Quality - Great for my blind girlfriend
customer_reviews.text: My girlfriend is blind. She loves the Big Bang Theory, but is always stuck having only half of the experience of watching the show (the audio). Well, no longer! Now she is able to engage another one of her senses! With this Big Bang Theory Lego set, she is able to play out everything happening in the eponymous living-room in real-time! The only issue we've experienced is that Howard and Leonard's hair feels similar, making it difficult for her to distinguish them. Altogether, a faithful reproduction of the show in Lego form.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Chimes

customer_reviews.title: Must have for any BBT lover!
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase of the holiday! I bought this for my adult sister who loves the show! She was tickled and excited to build it! The design is easy to follow and fun to set up. She now displays it proudly in her home.
customer_reviews.author: Gracie J

customer_reviews.title: Fun to assemble and display
customer_reviews.text: Went together pretty easily (a couple hours) and looked great fully assemble. Have it in a small display case - show it off frequently.
customer_reviews.author: K. Kramer

customer_reviews.title: He had so much fun with this set
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my husband. He had so much fun with this set. Very detailed and is a good likeness of the apartment. Love the small details of the food, cinnamon, and all the wall art. If you are a big bang fan or know one they would love this set.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Rambo

customer_reviews.title: Must have for any fan (especially if they're into LEGO)
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a birthday gift for my husband and he LOVED it. The minifigures alone would excite any fan, but the detail put into the livingroom set is spot on. Took him a little over an hour to build and then he proceeded to play with it as if he were a 10yo boy. He ended up taking it to work and I suspect he plays with it there. Needless to say, it's a great set.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: so the combination of the two was perfect. When I first saw it
customer_reviews.text: My son's a big fan of Lego and The Big Bang Theory, so the combination of the two was perfect. When I first saw it, I thought the price a bit steep for what you actually get, but he insisted and paid for it himself. After it was assembled, we used his spare Lego blocks to build the rest of the apartment. He's very satisfied with the product, as am I.
customer_reviews.author: Sayruh

customer_reviews.title: This set is great. My 11 year old put this together with ...
customer_reviews.text: This set is great. My 11 year old put this together with ease and loves this set. The apartment is adorable and the characters are on point. I think the comic book store would be a cute addition to LEGO and the Big Bang.
customer_reviews.author: j B. X4

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product and Excellent Seller
customer_reviews.text: I buyed for me to Mexico from US. For my birthday present and it was beyond expectations. Arrive two days early. In excellent condition. Everything perfect.
customer_reviews.author: KarlaT

customer_reviews.title: comes with tiny plates, cups and silverware. NOT ...
customer_reviews.text: comes with tiny plates, cups and silverware. NOT NEEDED. they dont fit anywhere so subtract about 20 pcs off the thing
customer_reviews.author: Patti W.

customer_reviews.title: BBT is the business!!!
customer_reviews.text: Who doesn't love BBT? I wish I got the lights to go with it. I really enjoyed putting this together and hopefully they will have the set for the rest of the cast homes... Love it!
customer_reviews.author: D James

customer_reviews.title: I have not opened it so I can't speak to the fun or challenge of putting it together
customer_reviews.text: I collect Lego sets and when I found out this set had just been retired, I had to buy it. I have not opened it so I can't speak to the fun or challenge of putting it together, but it's a nice box.
customer_reviews.author: puzzler

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: Was just what they were looking for and kept them busy on Christmas!!
customer_reviews.author: Vickie Courtney

customer_reviews.title: For True Fans...
customer_reviews.text: This is fantastic! Legos are always great... My husband is a huge BBT fan, and he's a scientist himself (an engineer, not a physicist!), but this was just the perfect Father's Day gift for a somewhat nerdy dad. The kids had fun putting it together with him and he loves having it to display. Pricey like Legos are, but high quality fun.
customer_reviews.author: Elise Miller

customer_reviews.title: Bazinga
customer_reviews.text: Solid lego product replica of a great TV show. Lots of fun.
customer_reviews.author: Ono Grindz

customer_reviews.title: fun
customer_reviews.text: worked with my son it was a lot of fun
customer_reviews.author: Travis and Monica

customer_reviews.title: Really small
customer_reviews.text: To say we are disappointed would be an understatement. This fully assembled item is really small and does NOT look like a $104.00 product. We have bought tons of Legos with over a thousand pieces, they were way bigger and less money.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Palladini

customer_reviews.title: LEGOs are forever
customer_reviews.text: LEGOs are always a great idea, perfect for relaxing after a tough day at the office, fun, challenging.... Oh wait they're for kids - who says !!
customer_reviews.author: ML Stewart

customer_reviews.title: It's awesome when things work together like this!
customer_reviews.text: As a long time LEGO enthusiast and together with my wife being a huge The Big Bang Theory fan I decided to buy this set to introduce her to the famous building blocks. Mission accomplished - she had a lot of fun putting it together and loves the final result. It captures the scene very well with lots of funny and cute details. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Victor

customer_reviews.title: 12+ means adults too!
customer_reviews.text: This set is cute and hilarious. My boyfriend and I put this together, meaning, even at 40, we were both able to follow directions intended for children 12+. Didn't even lose a piece, which I consider to be an achievement. If you like the show, grab this on Amazon (a lot cheaper than at the Lego store).
customer_reviews.author: Mail Debaser

customer_reviews.title: Excellent set for fans
customer_reviews.text: Lego + Big Bang Theory? Talk about nerd heaven! Great build, love the little details
customer_reviews.author: dajazz

customer_reviews.title: For the big kid in your family!
customer_reviews.text: One of the best lego sets I have ever bought. High number of pieces and as an adult it was so much fun to put together. Highly recommended for the big kid in your family. Each figure had a lot of thought put into them when made. It makes me smile every time I walk by it!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Its really great this lego
customer_reviews.text: Its really great this lego,really excellent on the details of each item but the minifigures mm should have been better but don't mistake this lego is great great butt, from 1 to 10 I give a solid 8. Thanks so much.
customer_reviews.author: enrico venezia gomez

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME, BUT...
customer_reviews.text: Great product, even though one of the heads of the characters was printed in the wrong way... "Bernardette" didn't have a matching head, which was rather surprising, keeping in mind how carefully you guys at Lego do things,,, There were enough heads for every character, but the proper "Bernardette" head was nowhere to be found. Have you heard similar complains either?
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro Merchán

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!  Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Love the Big Bang Theroy! Got it in the mail and me and my wife put it together last night. It looks awesome! Instructions we very easy. Now it will will be a show piece and a very good conversation starter.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Greunke

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: This is a gift so I hope it will work for him. He's a big fan of the show and of Legos
customer_reviews.author: Computer Jeanie

customer_reviews.title: Missing Sheldons head
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping but only got Sheldons hair. No head. We opened carefully so no pieces would be lost. One of the most important characters missing was a disappointment to my son when he opened it on his birthday. Other than that we were happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Alyce Felix

customer_reviews.title: Big Bang Theory Lego!  SAWHEEAAAAATTTT!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Um, it's Legos and Big Bang Theory. *Drops mic and walks away* All seriousness, this Lego set, just like the previous sets in the series, is awesome! Got it as a gift for my wife and she loves it. And no... she wont share with me or my sons. Bbbbooooooo!
customer_reviews.author: OG Geezer Gamer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome set good detail hope they will develop the rest ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome set good detail hope they will develop the rest of the apartment but was alot of fun putting together
customer_reviews.author: jerry gears

customer_reviews.title: I love how there are two different expressions on each person ...
customer_reviews.text: exactly what I expected, extra parts too. I love how there are two different expressions on each person by having a face on each side of the head
customer_reviews.author: Wanda

customer_reviews.title: So much fun!
customer_reviews.text: So much fun! My 14 year-old daughter and I put this together in 2 days. (She IS a teenager, so I have to share her time.) We love it. The detail is amazing. Our only complaint is that Penny looks like she's either sneering or frowning; but I've noticed that of most of the BBT products. (Not a very sunny, true to life character portrait .)
customer_reviews.author: DBS

customer_reviews.title: Love the little microscope and who can do without Sheldon's ...
customer_reviews.text: As a Big Bang enthusiast, this is a must have for my collection. Love the little microscope and who can do without Sheldon's Spot!
customer_reviews.author: jmso

customer_reviews.title: Bought them for my husband for a fun toy from Santa
customer_reviews.text: Bought them for my husband for a fun toy from Santa...I'm sure he will get a kick out of the set as he LOVES the show.
customer_reviews.author: 1st Time Grandma

customer_reviews.title: Great set, fun build
customer_reviews.text: Very close to the original room design. They could’ve added Penny’s chair instead of Leonard’s computer chair, but it still works.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: The whole experience has been perfect!  Couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.text: To think I'd be building with Legos at 66 years of age. I'm hooked all over again! Big Bang is my very favorite TV show and I just had to have this set. It arrived in a very timely manner and in perfect condition. Thank you Amazon and thank you Lego.
customer_reviews.author: Stuart M. Lasky

customer_reviews.title: Yay!  Two of the best things mixed into one!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE Lego and Big Bang Theory, so to have the two mixed was a fantastic treat! I loved putting the set together and seeing everything unfold. It has been my favorite set to put together so far, even though it was exceptionally easy.
customer_reviews.author: Jessicathegem

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I'm just going to say awesome I love Big Bang Theory and I love the themed Legos
customer_reviews.author: Regina

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this set and really enjoyed putting it together. So fun for BBT fans!

customer_reviews.title: big bang fan recommendation
customer_reviews.text: gift for my dad. great gift for any big bang fan. a little highly priced for the number of pieces in the lego set.
customer_reviews.author: darren stanley

customer_reviews.title: Great play set.
customer_reviews.text: Love legos and The Big Bang Theory. This set comes with extra pieces to play with and change up the scene.
customer_reviews.author: Cindyali

customer_reviews.title: Finally a Lego set that took longer than 30 minutes ...
customer_reviews.text: Finally a Lego set that took longer than 30 minutes for my kids to put together. It's crazy how the mini figurines look look so similar to the actors even though they're toys.
customer_reviews.author: ncg911

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely loved it! Definitely a must have for any fan of the show. It took a while to put together, but that's cause there was so many tiny details. They made sure to get the set, down to the books in the book case. It looks adorable, and completely worth it!!
customer_reviews.author: AlexisDawn

customer_reviews.title: It's great that this set has all the main characters in ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a present for my son and he loves it. It's great that this set has all the main characters in it.
customer_reviews.author: Naomi

customer_reviews.title: Big Hit for a Big Fan
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my husband for Christmas which kept him and the kids entertained after all the gifts were opened. The finished project now holds a place of honor in his home office. Unlike Sheldon and Lenard, the "toys" don't stay in the box unused to keep them in "mint" condition!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Two great things come together - BBT and Lego's!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter heard about these and wanted them. She's 10 and loves the set.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Dickson

customer_reviews.title: They like it very much
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my daughter and her family, fans of the show. They like it very much. The only thing lacking is the kitchen area.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Baker

customer_reviews.title: BBT is bad viewing but the set is great
customer_reviews.text: Think the show sucks but im a fan of lego modulars and lego city. This living room would make a great addition to a lego home or townhouse with some modifications. Good set for AFOLs who like to do MOCs. Plus alot of unique aspects regarding the minifigures and rare or seldom used parts.
customer_reviews.author: A. Salzman

customer_reviews.title: The big bang theory lego set
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with the big bang theory except I had to call with my missing parts. The Lego company is going to send all of my missing parts to me.
customer_reviews.author: michelle

customer_reviews.title: Worth any cost
customer_reviews.text: I love this set! My 12 year old got it for Christmas and had no problem putting it together. The scenery looks so elaborate and the Lego people resemble the actors well. It is a unique set and I love it!
customer_reviews.author: BLT

customer_reviews.title: Very detailed!!
customer_reviews.text: Very detailed. From books to the green lantern and the statues on the wall. Wish Lego had more of the BBT
customer_reviews.author: AmyC

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for myself as a fan of both legos and big bang theory.

customer_reviews.title: Great Fun
customer_reviews.text: I'm a big fan of the Show. Have not "played" with LEGO's since I helped my Grandson with a LEGO kit many years ago. Took part of two days to assemble. Over 400 parts. Great fun assembling. Now sits next to the TV. Great gift for any Big Bang Theory fan.
customer_reviews.author: John Rusteika

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for Big Bang fanatics
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son in law for his birthday and he loved it. The detail was amazing. Loved that all the figures were included even the dog. Easy to build and fun to play with.
customer_reviews.author: kat

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my dad ( A HUGE BBT FAN) during the holiday season. He was so excited he built it right away, and loves it! Its a fairly simple build, and the outcome is awesome! He shows it off on one of the first shelves in our house! Would recommend for any lego and/or big bang theory fan!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great attention to detail
customer_reviews.text: Comes with a alot of minurines. Great attention to detail. Took a few hours.
customer_reviews.author: rachelle lee pavlovic

customer_reviews.title: How fun and super detailed
customer_reviews.text: How fun and super detailed. I bought this for me but my granddaughter wants me to take it apart so she can put it together herself. A great collector piece for all us die-hard fans of Big Bang and Lego's.

customer_reviews.title: It all started with the big bang
customer_reviews.text: Such a great Lego set. All the characters included and the iconic living room is just perfection.

customer_reviews.title: Big Bang Theory fan? BUY THIS NOW!!!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love The Big Bang Theory and was thrilled to find the Lego set!!!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this set. For any fan of the Big Bang Theory this is an awesome collectable!!

customer_reviews.title: If you love the Big Bang Theory
customer_reviews.text: If you love the Big Bang Theory, this is awesome. We built this for my husband. Just like the living room in Leonard and Sheldon's place. Created very well.

customer_reviews.title: The Big Bang Theory does for Physics what Frasier did for Psychology
customer_reviews.text: What can I say? If you love TBBT, you'll love this. My only issue is I haven't put it together yet because, as the boys would say, "it's mint in box".

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the Big Bang Theory Fan!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great addition to our Lego set collections. My child and I had a great time putting the set together and seeing Sheldon and Lenard's apartment come to life. We were certainly not disappointed!

customer_reviews.title: Easy to build, great directions, and lots of detail!

customer_reviews.title: This set will be a Big Bang at Christmas
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a Christmas gift for someone else other than me. I'm sure it will be a hit. I was thrilled to see Lego has created this set.

customer_reviews.text: Old set but worth it if you’re a fan of the show or a lego fan in general.

customer_reviews.text: Big fan of the show and the details in this set are great. It comes with 7 figurines!

customer_reviews.title: A great gift for the lego lover in your life!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my son who loves building with legos, it was a hit! We are big fans of Big Bang Theory!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Big hit with my grandson! He put it together in no time at all.
customer_reviews.author: The Librarian

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a Christmas gift, he loved it & when I saw it made me want one too.
customer_reviews.author: C.C.C.

customer_reviews.title: Display Value rather than Play Value
customer_reviews.text: The design could be improved on, but job well done for what it's worth. Any TBBT fans would know right away that this LEGO set represents one of their favorite shows! With 7 minifigures, the price is okay. I would prefer to see more room made so all seven minifigures could be fit in more comfortably. Unfortunately none of the girls can sit fully on the chair or couch due to the hair. Makes a great display! I certainly do enjoy adding my TBBT characters to the Jurassic World sets I have. Now that's a unique way to play with LEGOs!
customer_reviews.author: ReptCrazed

product_meta.title: LEGO Ideas The Big Bang Theory 21302 Building Kit
product_meta.description: Build Leonard and Sheldon's living room for display and role play! Construct the detailed LEGO Ideas version of Leonard and Sheldon's living room from hit sitcom The Big Bang Theory including 7 minifigures. Indulge your inner genius and build this LEGO version of Leonard and Sheldon's living room as seen in the hit American sitcom The Big Bang Theory! This set was created by two LEGO fan designers-Ellen Kooijman from Sweden and Glen Bricker from the USA-and selected by LEGO Ideas members. Featuring loads of authentic details to satisfy all The Big Bang Theory devotees and including minifigures of all seven main characters from the show, it's ideal for display or role-play fun. Includes 7 minifigures with assorted accessory elements: Leonard, Sheldon, Penny, Howard, Raj, Amy and Bernadette. Features Leonard and Sheldon's living room with all the iconic elements from the sitcom, including a telescope, whiteboard, DNA display model and various ornaments.
feature_bullets: Build an authentic replica of Leonard and Sheldon's living room in LEGO bricks
Great for display or role-playing scenes from the TV series
Includes a booklet about the designers and the hit American sitcom
The perfect gift for LEGO and The Big Bang Theory fans of all ages
Measures over 3" (8cm) high, 8" (22cm) wide and 4" (12cm) deep
